title: Choose your delivery date
error_loading: Could not load delivery dates. Please refresh the page and try again.
error_unexpected_data: Received unexpected data from the server. Please contact support if this persists.
error_saving: Could not save delivery date. Please try selecting a date again.
error_saving_shipping: Could not save shipping method. Please refresh the page.
no_dates_available: There are currently no delivery dates available.
error_boundary_message: We encountered an unexpected error while loading the delivery date picker. Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.
error_network: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error_timeout: Request timed out. Please try again in a moment.
error_server: Server temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error_validation: Invalid data provided. Please check your selection and try again.
